transaction.waitingForMining: Waiting for transaction to be mined...

addonmanager.title: Addon Manager
addonmanager.description: Manages protocol addons and their factories.

addonmodule.title: Addon Factory Module
addonmodule.description: Manages addon modules and can add addon instance contracts to compliance allow lists.

addonregistrymodule.title: Addon Factory Registry Module
addonregistrymodule.description: Manages the addon registry module and administers addon factory modules.

admin.title: Default Admin
admin.description: Can grant and revoke all roles. Full protocol control.

auditor.title: Auditor
auditor.description: View-only access to permissions, identities, audit logs, and system state.

claimpolicymanager.title: Claim Policy Manager
claimpolicymanager.description: Manages trusted issuers and claim topics for identity verification.

claimissuer.title: Claim Issuer
claimissuer.description: Can create and attach claims to identities. Does not automatically grant trusted issuer status.

compliancemanager.title: Compliance Manager
compliancemanager.description: Registers and configures compliance modules, including global compliance settings and bypass lists.

custodian.title: Custodian
custodian.description: Handles freezing, forced transfers, and asset recovery.

emergency.title: Emergency
emergency.description: Can pause contracts and perform emergency interventions.

fundsmanager.title: Funds Manager
fundsmanager.description: Authorized to withdraw funds collected during the token sale, including both native and ERC20 currencies.

governance.title: Governance
governance.description: Manages token governance, verification, and compliance.

identitymanager.title: Identity Manager
identitymanager.description: Manages the identity registry, including registering and recovering identities and onboarding users.

identityregistrymodule.title: Identity Registry Module
identityregistrymodule.description: Manages the identity registry module and can modify identity storage.

organisationidentitymanager.title: Organisation Identity Manager
organisationidentitymanager.description: Manages organisation-level identity claims, such as KYC, AML, and licenses.

saleadmin.title: Sale Admin
saleadmin.description: Manages token sale parameters and operations, including configuring sale settings and controlling sale lifecycle.

supplymanagement.title: Supply Management
supplymanagement.description: Can mint and burn tokens. Controls token supply.

systemmanager.title: System Manager
systemmanager.description: Bootstraps and manages the system, upgrades, and core protocol configuration. Can register token factories, addons, and compliance modules.

systemmodule.title: System Module
systemmodule.description: Manages system modules, including registering compliance modules and topic schemes. Administers registry module roles.

tokenfactorymodule.title: Token Factory Module
tokenfactorymodule.description: Manages token factory modules and can add token contracts to compliance allow lists.

tokenfactoryregistrymodule.title: Token Factory Registry Module
tokenfactoryregistrymodule.description: Manages the token factory registry module and administers token factory modules.

tokenmanager.title: Token Manager
tokenmanager.description: Deploys and configures tokens within the protocol.

trustedissuersmetaregistrymodule.title: Trusted Issuers Meta Registry Module
trustedissuersmetaregistrymodule.description: Manages the trusted issuers meta registry and can add trusted issuers.
